author: davidw
msg: * doc/rivet.xml: Added 'Introduction' section.

author: davidw
msg: * doc/rivet.xml: Reworked several elements to better utilize docbook.
* doc/rivet.xsl: Major reworking of several elements, including group
and arg.  Added lots of style changes.
* src/make.tcl: Add commands and dependencies to build extensions
documents without chunks, and the main Rivet docs in chunks
(seperate HTML files are output).
* doc/rivet.xml: Updated docs to reflect new Apache directives.
* src/mod_rivet.c (Rivet_InitTclStuff): Change default CacheSize to
MaxRequestsPerChild / 5, which should still be plenty, but will
waste less space.

author: davidw
msg: * src/rivetCore.c (Rivet_Include): "include" command now saves channel
encoding/translation, outputs the included file to stdout with
binary translation/encoding, and then resets the original settings.
Fixes problem with EUC-JP characters in included files.
* tests/lang.test: Added file to test LANG setting in server, to check
character encodings.
* tests/parse.test: Added EUC-JP characters to test that they come
through ok.
* tests/include.test: Added EUC-JP characters to test that they come
through ok.

author: davidw
msg: * src/TclWebapache.c (TclWeb_InitEnvVars): Don't do an ap_clear_table
on the environmental variables.  The include module no longer does
this, and neither does PHP, so I guess it's safe to remove, and it's
useful for users of modules like mod_uniqe_id.
Added a few comments to the make file.

author: davidw
msg: Added bug tracker link to docs.
